first-contentful-paint.description: First Contentful Paint marks the time at which the first text or image is painted.

largest-contentful-paint.description: Largest Contentful Paint marks the time at which the largest text or image is painted.

cumulative-layout-shift.description: Cumulative Layout Shift measures the movement of visible elements within the viewport.

total-blocking-time.description: Sum of all time periods between FCP and Time to Interactive.

color-contrast.displayValue: All text has sufficient color contrast
color-contrast.description: Background and foreground colors have a sufficient contrast ratio.

image-alt.description: Informative elements should aim for short, descriptive alternate text.

heading-order.displayValue: Heading elements are in a logical order
heading-order.description: Properly ordered headings convey the semantic structure of the page.

uses-https.description: All origins are served over HTTPS.

no-vulnerable-libraries.description: Some third-party scripts may contain known security vulnerabilities.

csp-xss.description: Content Security Policy is an effective defense against XSS attacks.

meta-description.description: Meta descriptions may be included in search results.

document-title.description: The title gives screen reader users an overview of the page.

robots-txt.displayValue: robots.txt is valid but has minor issues
robots-txt.description: If your robots.txt file is malformed, crawlers may not be able to understand how you want your website to be crawled or indexed.
